editPage.promptExamplesDescription: Add conversation examples that guide how the AI should behave.
editPage.greetingDescriptionDefault: Let others know who your character is!
editPage.title: Create & Edit Persona
editPage.instructionsDescription: Define the core identity of the AI, such as its role, personality, and tone.
editPage.instructionsPlaceholder: e.g., You are a friendly AI assistant.
editPage.promptExamplesPlaceholder: e.g., User: How's the weather? / Assistant: It's a bright and sunny day!
editPage.tagsDescription: You can add multiple tags at once, separated by commas (,).
editPage.errorRequired: Name and Persona Type are required fields.

validation.allFieldsRequired: Please fill in all fields. Instructions, prompt examples, and tags must have at least one entry.
validation.charLimitExceeded: Exceeded character limit for greeting or first scene.
validation.instructionsLimitExceeded: Exceeded character limit for instructions or more than 10 entries.
validation.promptExamplesLimitExceeded: Exceeded character limit for prompt examples or more than 10 entries.

editPage.greetingPlaceholderDefault: e.g., I'm Luna, a genius alchemist who always brings a vibrant smile and explosions(!). I firmly believe failure is the mother of success, and today I'm challenging myself to invent something that will amaze the world!
editPage.assetSectionDescription: You can display images appropriate for specific situations during chat.
editPage.firstSceneDescription: Describe the background and situation when the character first appears.
editPage.firstScenePlaceholder: e.g., Luna is brewing a magic potion in a small cabin in a quiet forest.
editPage.greetingDescription: Greeting message the persona will use to start a conversation.
editPage.greetingPlaceholder: e.g., Hello! How can I help you?

settingPage.title: My Page
settingPage.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the persona '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.

feed.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.slogan: Log in to access all features.

bidModal.bidIncrementError: Bid must be in increments of {minBidIncrement} neurons.

paymentModal.creditLowMessage2: You can select and recharge your desired neuron pack below.
paymentModal.chargeCreditsMessage: Select your desired neuron pack to enjoy more features.
paymentModal.contactSupport: Please contact customer support for payment inquiries.

feedbackModal.submitFailed: Failed to submit feedback. Please try again later.
feedbackModal.thanks: Thank you for your valuable feedback!
feedbackModal.thanksMessage: Your feedback helps us make better services.
feedbackModal.title: Send anonymous feedback to the developer
feedbackModal.body1: Any feedback is welcome. We will listen to insults and criticisms.
feedbackModal.body2: Your valuable feedback helps us improve our service.

title: Session Settings
guidanceText: * Each function affects the current character session. Please choose carefully.

tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.description: Check out how to use the service.

sendFailedWs: WebSocket not connected, message sending failed

welcomeModal.title: Welcome to PersonaXI!
welcomeModal.neuronReward: As a welcome gift, you've received {amount} Neurons!

noticeModal.title: Alpha Test Participation Guide
noticeModal.description1: This service is currently an alpha version under development, and we aim to create a better AI persona with you.
noticeModal.description2: During the test period, unexpected errors may occur or data may be arbitrarily changed or initialized. We are doing our best for the official release, so we ask for your kind understanding.
noticeModal.techStackDescription: This service is experimentally applying the latest technologies.
noticeModal.aiWarningDescription: We are applying experimental prompting techniques to the AI model, so sometimes the AI may give sensitive or inappropriate answers. This is part of the process to implement more free and human-like interactions.
noticeModal.confirm: I have read and understood all of the above.

firstPersonaCreatedModal.title: First Persona Created!
firstPersonaCreatedModal.message2: you've received {amount} Neurons as a gift!
firstPersonaCreatedModal.message3: Now, use these neurons to have deeper conversations with your own 'digital life form'.

notEnoughNeuronsModal.title: Not Enough Neurons!
notEnoughNeuronsModal.description: Please recharge your neurons to continue the conversation.
notEnoughNeuronsModal.rechargeDescription: Recharge neurons to enjoy more conversations.
notEnoughNeuronsModal.firstCreationReward: Get 200 Neurons for your first Persona creation!
notEnoughNeuronsModal.rechargeAlert: You need more tokens to continue. Please recharge your account.

consentModal.agreeChatLogs: I agree to Chat & Log Data Collection.
consentModal.agreeToAll: Agree to all terms and conditions.
consentModal.alertAllAgreed: You must agree to all required terms.
